Author: hatsune miku
Content: How to make it force backup?

Author: Elessar
Content: check in the apps settings.  hit more where it says privacy and data. It will tell you when your last back up was.

Author: hatsune miku
Content: Or force download

Author: Elessar
Content: Neko - Switching eggs or farms will force an update

Author: hatsune miku
Content: Oh?

Author: Elessar
Content: forcing a download I have only been able to do by reinstalling the game (one direction works fine_ going back the other way takes a reinstall for me)

Author: hatsune miku
Content: How to switch farm when there no contract

Author: lamCube
Content: To trigger a backup you just need to do some meaningful action changing your farm state_ like buying something_ or hitting a few drones_ or toggling some configuration. Visit the privacy & data page until you see a backup in the last few seconds

Author: lamCube
Content: being connected to the Internet helps

Author: McMaster2017
Content: Thank youso much_ i can now do thr contracts

Author: Elessar
Content: It backs up periodically on its own_ but switching eggs or farms (only if you have a contract) is the only thing I’ve seen that forces it right then.
